vote.text: Amendment SA 257 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 257 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S3338; text: CR S3338) Of a technical nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 257 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 257 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
